From the brand

Create the happiness in life

Focus on car mount for 6 years, TOPGO improved structure and materials to enhance user experience.

Cup Phone Holder for Car

Cup Holder Phone Mount Pro Ver

Cell Phone Stand for Desk

phone grip mount for popsocket

UPGRADED SOLID GOOSENECK: The arm of gooseneck phone holder adopts better materials and design, make it more stable and durable. Between the Up to 8 inch long neck, makes it easier and flexible to operate and access your mobile phone. You can adjust the gooseneck to avoid blocking the gearshift. Also you can adjust the height as you like, achieve maximum flexibility.
STRONG AND DURABLE: Made with an adjustable Nano silica air bag stable support shelf and thickened anti-slip rubber pads, both of thisï¼achieving the phone holder will securely lock in your cup holder. Holder has extended arms for wider depth and longer length, 360 degree rotation for desired position vertical or horizontal mode.
SECURE GRIP & ANTI-SLIP SURFACE: The curved arm and 2 holding feet provide all-round protection for your phone. Soft sponge cushions protect the devices from damage.
SIMPLE TO INSTALL: Cup holder phone mount is Adjustable and fits firmly and perfectlyï¼securely in the cup holder for car, Pretty good choice for most cars, vehicle, pickup trucks, SUVs, trucks, taxi, tesla, boat, golf cart; a helpful fellow for Uber, Lyft drivers.
UNIVERSAL CELL PHONE HOLDER: Suitable for all types of 2.01′ – 3.54′ wide devices, such as iPhone 14 iPhone 13 Pro Max 12 Mini 11 Pro/SE2/XS Mas/XR/8/7 Plus/6s, Samsung galaxy S22 Ultra/S21/20/10/S9+/S8 Plus/S7 Edge/Note20/10/9, Huawei, HTC, LG, MOTO, GPS, Google Pixel, Nexus, Nikia, Oneplus, etc.
NOTE: Phone holder can not fit the phone with battery case, support maximum 0.51″ thickness device,The maximum size of the Phone cradle-holders base is the diameter 4â, Please carefully compare the size of the car cup holder and the product before purchase to ensure that this product can be placed in the car cup holder.

Next page

Previous page

  1. Installation Guide

    Step 1:

    Unscrew the nut from the back of the phone holder. Slip nut over the ball on the extension arm.

  2. Installation Guide

    Step 2:

    Snap ball into the hole on the back. Tighten nut onto the back of the holder by turning clockwise.

  3. Installation Guide

    Step 3

    Place base of phone holder assembly in the vehicle Gup holder.

  4. Installation Guide

    Step 4

    Twist knob on top of base clockwise to tighten and counter clockwise to loosen.

SHLINUX LIGHTING Brand:

Shlinux always focus the Research and Innovation in lighting industryWe have been adhering to the principle of quality firstOur Team create this kind of desk lamp with remote, very practical and functional!We still make unremitting efforts to create better productsBest Wishes ï¼

Shlinux Distinct Desk Lamp

White color remote control desk lamp, light up your working station

18W LED 3 Modes 6 Brightness, Modern Desk Light for Home Office

A bright desk lamp suitable for 2 computers lighting. fits nicely behind the monitor, extend up and over to shine on their surface.

ãStepless Dimming with two control waysã LED lamp has 3 color modes for warm light(3000K), warm white light(4000K), white light(6000K). Each lighting mode has 6 brightness dimming levels. So there are 18 lighting modes to meet all requirements. This architect desk lamp is controlled by touch sensitive switch on lamp bar or a remote controller, very conveniently
ãEye Protection and Memory Functionã Our clamp light is composed of 96 LED beads, it has uniform brightness, NO GLARE, NO FLICKERING, soft light, which can protect eyesight and reduce eye strain, It is ideal for reading, drawing, sewing, working, studying. The clamp desk lamp is a good help for kids & bookworms, one key for reading mode, memory function can keep the mode and brightness last used
ãSpace Saving and Modern Styleã Task light with sturdy metal clamp, which can support a tabletop thickness up to 2.6 inches. It holds the gooseneck lamp securely in place. The metal clamp is also equipped with a silicone pad to avoid scratching table. The flexible gooseneck study lamp, which can be adjusted 360Â° to provide multi-directional lighting, and is easy to carry and more save space than stand-up desk lamp
ãQuality WarrantyãSHLINUX always supply good quality led lamp. what included in box : A Shlinux led desk light, An English Manual & Quality Power Adapter and warranty service, and 24H friendly customer support

SHLINUX Upgrade 18W Bright Led Gooseneck Desk Lamp Illuminate Entire Workbench

SHLINUX clamp lamp has 96 LED Beads,18.2 inch lamp bar in length, offer 1511 Lumen, about 100w incandescent bulb equivalent, to illuminate every corner of your table,Born with 360Â°adjustable gooseneck design with durable metal clamp, SHLINUX study lamp is fully diffused and lighting stably and gently without flickering, also which can prevent blue light damaged to the eyes.

It is featured with memory function,then your last lighting setting will be turned on again when work lamp was powered-on,very convenient. saving space with a metal clamp supports to 2.6inch/7.5cm wide desk, fix the clamp light where needed, it won’t take any desk space.

It supports 3 colors and 6 brightness levels under each color mode,you will get 18 lighting modes to meet all your daily requirements

EYE-CARING, NO FLICKER, NO GLARE

NO LIMIT LIGHT DIRECTION, NO SHADOW !

SHLINUX Architect Desk Clamp Lamp

Upgrade Horizontal lighting bar with Flexible Gooseneck

This work light is most suitable for a workbench with 1 or 2 computers, providing enough brightness, the task lamp is light, easy to install, the lighting angle can be adjusted freely, suitable for work, study, reading.

  • No flickering LEDs and diffused lighting gently
  • 360Â°flexible gooseneck design allow bend to any direction

HIGH COLOR RENDERING

EASY TO CONTROL THIS MODERN DESK LAMP

It supports two types to control the study lamp

Sensitive touch (one key will finish all functions select exclude the timer)

  • Holding touch will change the brightness

Product Description

ã2022 Upgrade Stable Tablet Standã Made of Heavy duty aluminum-magnesium alloy solid cord , stiffened material, very sturdy and flexible. 30 inches (76 CM) Overall Length from bottom to top. Moreover, compared to most of the tablet stands on the market, our tablet holder is upgraded, the bottom is additionally reinforced to ensure its maximum stability. Make it strong and sturdy to protect your cellphone and tablet.
ãBroad Compatibilityã VIVI MAO tablet holder has a wide range of compatibility, suitable for almost all 4.7-12.9 inch devices on the market, such as iPad mini 2 3 4 5,iPad Pro 9.7 10.5 11 12.9, iPad Air 2 3 4, Galaxy tabs, Switch, Fire HD tab , iPhone 13 /pro Max /Pro/X/11 10 8 7 6 , Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1″ 10.5″ 9.7″ 9.6″ 8″, Kindle Fire HD 7 8 10 , ect. In addition, the tablet phone is equipped with silicone pads, which will protect your device from scratch and damage.
ãReinforced Bolt Clamp BaseãReinforced and thickened base, not easy to break. Non-slip silicone pads are added to the base clip to avoid damage to your furniture. The base has a maximum clamp size of 3.7 inches, maximizing usability. Whether you’re laying in bed watching movie, viewing recipes in the kitchen,exercising in the gym, or using your devices anywhere, you don’t have to worry about falling and breaking it.
ãEasy to Mount & Positionã This gooseneck clamp can be mount to many places like bed headboard, desk or table next to your favorite chair. With 360 degree rotate clip and flexble arm, It can be adjusted to your eye level or any other height you want.Â Free your hands when watching movies, playing games, reading, viewing recipes, recording videos, etc.
ãUsing Tipsã1. Please loop the long arm into âS or Z “shape or circle shape helps maintain more stability . 2. The material of the holder is stronger for the heavy tablet, it will be a litte hard to bend, so please use your both hands to bend the holder when you start to use it. 3. This type of gooseneck tablet holder is perfect for reading,viewing,or recording. But when you tap on your tablet frequently , it unavoidably bounces and wobbles due to some law of physics.
